colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021A *, ,(ZHES BLA MA GSANG BDE 'JIGS DGYES DUS 'KHOR LNGA'I RNAL 'BYOR GYI RIM PA NYAMS SU LEN TSUL DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SA'ING NO YON GYI AA MAK GUNG TSOG THU AER TE NI WI'I TZING KARMA SKYABS KYI SHOG GI SLOB DPON THON DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, YI DAM DE LNGA DANG 'BREL BA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR BZLAS PA GTOR 'BUL SOGS DANG RANG GI GNAS LNGAR THIM NAS RGYUN DU BSHAR SGOM TSUL CHA LAG TSANG BA MAN NGAG ZHAL SHES DANG BCAS PA DGOS ZHES NAN CHER BSKUL MA MDZAD PA LTAR, RJE BTZUN DAM PA'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL DGE SLONG RGAN PO GRAGS PA DAR RGYAS SAM BZHAD RDO RJE MING CAN GYIS, RGYAL BA DBEN SA PA CHEN PO DANG, ,DE SRAS RJE MKHAS GRUB SANGS RGYAS YE SHES DANG, RGYAL BA YAB SRAS GNYIS SOGS DGE LDAN SNYAN RGYUD KYI MAN NGAG 'DZIN PA BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LAS 'BYUNG BA BZHIN PHYOGS GCIG TU BSGRIGS TE SA PHO RTA LO CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I TSES BCO LNGAR DBEN GNAS RANG GSHAG AE WAm DGA' 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SDOM BRTZON BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG GIS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG DGE LDAN SNYAN RGYUD KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DANG GZHAN GYI RGYUD LA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS,, ,,)
